Text: I forgot to put this in the description. I had originally used these for my phone. If you want to view them on an android device, grab tTorrent (free from market) and Droid Comic Viewer (also free from market). Use tTorrent to download the file and extract the files from there. Then use Droid Comic Viewer to read and enjoy!

hey is it possible to put them on my iphone?

@tae_maed you can put them on your iPhone, but you need a comic viewer. If you do a Google search, there are quite a few different ones and ways to do it.  
@Naikum you're welcome!! I hope you enjoy them like I did :D
